Package gettysburg.common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BattleDescriptor
    The BattleDescriptor is a simple data structure that represents the units involved in one battle in the game.
    BattleResolution
    The BattleResolution contains all of the information that a client needs in order to understand the complete results of a battle.
    Coordinate
    The Coordinate represents the (x, y) reference to a particular Square on the board.
    GbgBoard
    The GbgBoard defines the size of the board.
    GbgGame
    This is the public interface for the game service.
    GbgSquareDescriptor
    The GbgSquareDescriptor is used to provide all information about a particular square.
    GbgUnit
    The GbgUnit class contains all of the information about a unit in the game.
    TestGbgGame
    TestGbgGame is an interface that is used for testing purposes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArmyID
    The ArmyID identifies the two sides and provides a string description for a user interface.
    BattleResult
    This enumeration represents the results of a battle.
    Direction
    The Direction enumeration identifies the eight directions that are straight lines from a reference Coordinate.
    GbgGameStep
    A simple enumeration, with string descriptors of the game play steps.
    Terrain
    The Terrain enumeration identifies all of the types of terrain that are used.
    UnitSize
    The UnitSize enumeration identifies the unit sizes and provides a string description and a symbol that is the typical representation of the size of a unit, as it appears on the unit tokens in the game.
    UnitType
    The UnitType identifies the types of units in the game and provides a string description for clients with user interfaces.
